name: barinek/uservices
body:
### Introduction

* Reduce the cost of change

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/barinek/uservices/master/evolve.png)

### Project Structure

I've used a series of Git commit tags to illustrate each steps.

```
git tag -ln

v1              First commit
v2              Functional groups
v3              Feature groups
v4              Components
v5              Services
```

###  (v1) First commit

###  (v2) Functional groups

###  (v3) Feature groups

###  (v4) Components

###  (v5) Services

###  Summary


Thanks! (@barinek) and thanks to () for the copy edit!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
